articles.title: Every supermarket that will require face masks after July 19 - FULL LIST - Express
articles.description: LOCKDOWN rules will ease from Monday and wearing face masks will no longer be a legal requirement in public settings. However, some supermarkets and shops will still encourage people to wear a face-covering after the July 19 lockdown easing.
